Package Entity

Class School

java.lang.Object
Entity.School
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class School
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Represents a school that students belong to. A school can have many students. A school can have many courses that belong to it.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    School​(java.lang.String schoolName, AccessPeriod accessperiod)
    Creates a new School with the given name, access period, and initialises an empty list of courses.

    • setAccessPeriod

      public void setAccessPeriod​(java.time.LocalDateTime startDate, java.time.LocalDateTime endDate)
      Sets the access period of the school based on the start and end date time.
      Parameters:
      startDate - The start datetime of the access period.
      endDate - The end datetime of the access period.

    • setSchoolName

      public void setSchoolName​(java.lang.String schoolName)
      Sets the name of the school.
      Parameters:
      schoolName - The name to set.

    • setCourseList

      public void setCourseList​(Course C)
      Adds a course to the school's course list.
      Parameters:
      C - The course to add. Should be a Course object.

    • addCourse

      public void addCourse()
      Adds a course to the school. Is used by the AdminControl class to add a new course.

    • getCourseCode

      public java.lang.String getCourseCode​(int i)
      Gets the course code of a course in the school's course list.
      Parameters:
      i - The index of the course in the school's course list.
      Returns:
      The course code of the course at index i in the school's course list.
